tour.title: Let’s explore your Sizigi account.
tour.description: Welcome to the profile section of your Sizigi account. Start by briefly exploring some of the main features and get to know your way around, and you can get back here from your settings menu.

preview_summary.title: Summary
preview_summary.video_support: Your browser does not support HTML5 video.

digital_presence.title: My Digital Presence
digital_presence.support_text: Let’s channel our inner professional, artist, blogger, influence, videographer! The list goes on and on but you get what we mean.
digital_presence.success: Digital presence has been changed successfully

upgrade_warn.title: Wait!
upgrade_warn.description:
We noticed that you’ve run out of job card for this subscription tier!
You’re doing such a great job why not upgrade to track more jobs?
upgrade_warn.warn_description: If you decide not to upgrade, the job card you made will still be saved!

upgrade_sure.title: Are you sure?
upgrade_sure.description:
We really want you to keep your supercharged job hunt experience with us!
Would 15% off 1 year help you out?
(so if you’re a student, you’d get a whopping 65% off!!!)

downgrade_sure.title: Are you sure?
downgrade_sure.description: Some of your job card will become inactive if you downgrade now. Would 20% off next month’s subscription sweeten the deal enough for you to stay?
downgrade_sure.warn_description: If you decide to downgrade, XX job cards will become inactive.

new_job.toast_upgrade: You cannot create another inactive job card. Please upgrade your plan.

placeholder.jobTitle: What position are you applying for?
placeholder.url: Copy-paste the job posting link here!
placeholder.description: Does this job have any requirements, specific responsibilities, or anything noteable you’d like to keep in mind when adding content to your pitch/profile?

tour.avatar: Upload a profile image. Remember this will be part of your professional presentation.
tour.about: Select to add general information about yourself and where you're located.
tour.contact: Contact details enable interested parties to reach out.
tour.interests: Interests are like the terms and keywords you're passionate about in your career. Sizigi uses these details to better connect you with opportunities.
tour.job_experience: This is a snapshot of where you’ve worked. Add as many as you like.
tour.education: Education is important, but so are life experiences and telling your story.
tour.certificates: Got any extracurricular certifications or extended learning you want to talk about?
tour.skills: Adding your skills is a list, but this is not your resume, just a guide that lets people know a bit about you to begin.
tour.resume: Upload your resume, C.V., Infographic or presentation here. It accepts .Doc and PDF files.
tour.summary: This is your Video Summary. It can be changed at any time, but it’s sort of the first window into who you are that people get to see.

modal_success_payment.title: Your now on the {PLAN} Plan
modal_success_payment.resume: Woohoo! Your new subscription gives you access to more tools and features to show off those skills and experiences in the jobs you're tracking. Better start getting your interview outfit ready!

plan_starter.title: Starter Plan
plan_starter.description: This is a free plan and with it you will not have insights and metrics about your pitches and library.

plan_analytics.title: Premium Analytics plan
plan_analytics.description: You have the analytics plan and with it you have insights and metrics about your pitches and library.
plan_analytics.renewal: Your plan renewal date will be every {RENEWAL}.
plan_analytics.canceled: On {DATE_CANCEL}, you canceled your subscription renewal. The features of your plan will be available until {DATE_AVAILABLE}. After that, you can renew your subscription.

no_invoices.title: No invoices
no_invoices.description: You don't have any invoices yet.

no_disputes.title: No refunds or disputes
no_disputes.description: You have no open disputes or refund orders. If you need help, send us a message.

board.content_first_access:
Welcome to your application tracker!
Here are 3 things you need to know to get started.

1. The left is where you can access your different boards and contact list (available soon).
2. Each swimlane represents where each job is in it’s application journey.
3. You can click-and-drag your job card between swimlanes.
